query:
ALTER TABLE subscriptions 
ADD COLUMN plan ENUM('creator', 'pro', 'studio', 'label') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'creator',
ADD COLUMN billingCycle ENUM('monthly', 'annual') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'monthly',
ADD COLUMN trialEndsAt TIMESTAMP NULL;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS subscription_changes (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  subscriptionId INT NOT NULL,
  fromPlan ENUM('creator', 'pro', 'studio', 'label') NOT NULL,
  toPlan ENUM('creator', 'pro', 'studio', 'label') NOT NULL,
  fromBillingCycle ENUM('monthly', 'annual') NOT NULL,
  toBillingCycle ENUM('monthly', 'annual') NOT NULL,
  proratedCredit DECIMAL(10, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  effectiveDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  reason TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (subscriptionId) REFERENCES subscriptions(id),
  INDEX subscription_change_subscriptionId_idx (subscriptionId)
);

ADD COLUMN plan ENUM('creator', 'pro', 'studio', 'label') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'creator',
ADD COLUMN billingCycle ENUM('monthly', 'annual') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'monthly',
ADD COLUMN trialEndsAt TIMESTAMP NULL;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS subscription_changes (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  subscriptionId INT NOT NULL,
  fromPlan ENUM('creator', 'pro', 'studio', 'label') NOT NULL,
  toPlan ENUM('creator', 'pro', 'studio', 'label') NOT NULL,
  fromBillingCycle ENUM('monthly', 'annual') NOT NULL,
  toBillingCycle ENUM('monthly', 'annual') NOT NULL,
  proratedCredit DECIMAL(10, 2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  effectiveDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  reason TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (subscriptionId) REFERENCES subscriptions(id),
  INDEX subscription_change_subscriptionId_idx (subscriptionId)
);
